name: Edgier Mirror
description:
Edgier Mirror is a small gamejam game I've made to expand my knowledge a bit about practical 3D rendering in LibGDX.

Game's objective is to collect as many coins as possible, spawning in the world one after one. To traverse the world use WASD to control the ball and mouse to change the state of the blocks at cursor. Remember to make use of the structures you've made before to travel faster!

The game does have a leftover debug view (shift) and console ('), which I've decided to left there for you to explore a bit, but aren't actively supported.
